snippet: A ceremony on Friday began two days of anniversary rallies, protests and memorials for Mr. Garner, whose death by police chokehold on Staten Island set off nationwide protests.
abstract: Family and friends of Eric Garner begin two days of rallies, protest and memorials to mark year anniversary since Garner died after being put into chokehold by New York City police officer in Staten Island.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Emma G. Fitzsimmons, Edna Ishayik, Ileana Najarro, Andy Newman and Rebecca White.

lead_paragraph: A ceremony on Friday began two days of anniversary rallies, protests and memorials for Mr. Garner, whose death by police chokehold on Staten Island set off nationwide protests.

headline.main: Eric Garner Is Remembered One Year After His Death
headline.print_headline: Garner Is Remembered in Services and Protests a Year After His Death
